sect3.title: Functions can't have more than one parameter with the same name
sect3.para: It is no longer possible to define two function parameters with the same name. For example, the following method will trigger E_COMPILE_ERROR:

sect3.title: $HTTP_RAW_POST_DATA removed
sect3.para: $HTTP_RAW_POST_DATA is no longer available. The php://input stream should be used instead.

sect3.title: # comments in INI files removed
sect3.para: Support for prefixing comments with # in INI files has been removed. ; should be used instead.

sect3.title: Invalid octal literals
sect3.para: Previously, octal literals that contained invalid numbers were silently truncated (0128 was taken as 012). Now, an invalid octal literal will cause a parse error.
